name: Rope Blaster
description:
Rope Blaster is a game where you grab walls with your rope and use that to move around. 

You can touch gray blocks. They don't do anything. You can't on blue blocks, and you need to avoid touching red blocks. This is used to create challenging puzzles and obstacles. Later in the game there are also boxes, which you can move around. Then you will see buttons, which you can press.

Try to get through all the levels. Can you do it?
